Name: Computer Lab A
Description: Main computer laboratory with 30 Windows workstations, equipped with latest software development tools and IDEs.

Name: Computer Lab B
Description: Secondary computer lab with 25 Linux workstations, specialized for web development and database management.

Name: Electronics Lab
Description: Electronics and circuits laboratory with oscilloscopes, function generators, and breadboard stations.

Name: Network Lab
Description: Networking laboratory with Cisco routers, switches, and network simulation equipment for hands-on training.

Name: Mobile Development Lab
Description: Specialized lab for mobile app development with Android and iOS development stations and testing devices.

Name: AI/Machine Learning Lab
Description: High-performance computing lab with GPU workstations for artificial intelligence and machine learning projects.

Name: Cybersecurity Lab
Description: Isolated network environment for cybersecurity training, penetration testing, and digital forensics.

Name: Multimedia Lab
Description: Creative lab equipped with high-end workstations for video editing, 3D modeling, and graphic design.
